mapper.select: SELECT B.IDX, B.TITLE, IFNULL(U.NICKNAME, '탈퇴 회원'), B.CREATED_AT, B.VIEWS, COUNT(BL.IDX) AS LIKE_COUNT, B.REF, B.LEV, B.TURN FROM BOARDS B LEFT JOIN USERS U ON B.USER_IDX = U.IDX LEFT JOIN BOARD_LIKES BL ON B.IDX = BL.BOARD_IDX AND BL.IS_LIKE = 1 WHERE B.BOARD_TYPE_IDX = 2 GROUP BY B.IDX, B.TITLE, B.CREATED_AT, B.VIEWS, U.NICKNAME, B.REF, B.LEV, B.TURN ORDER BY B.REF DESC, B.TURN ASC LIMIT #{listSize} OFFSET #{cp};
